concept.title: Collection Server configuration
concept.shortdesc: The following is a sample rtms.properties file for a HPE RTMS Collection Server configuration:

conbody.screen: #SNMP Entity# # Configure the SNMP transport listen address listenIpAddress=0.0.0.0 # Configure the SNMP transport listen port listenPort=161 # Configure the retry counter for the SNMP Commands commandRetryCounter=5 #Thread Pool Size threadPool=25 # Communication fails then SNMP retries count to connect with SNMP Agent retriesCount = 3 # Communication fails then SNMP retries count to connect with SNMP Agent in milliseconds retriesTimeOut = 3000
